    • Method Detail

      • postRequest

        public org.json.JSONObject postRequest(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                       java.lang.String url,
                                       org.json.JSONObject params)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.json.JSONException,
                                       SmartAPIException
        Makes a POST request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of params which has to be sent in the body.
        Returns:
        JSONObject which is received by Smart API.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • postRequest

        public org.json.JSONObject postRequest(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                       java.lang.String url,
                                       org.json.JSONObject params,
                                       java.lang.String accessToken)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       SmartAPIException,
                                       org.json.JSONException
        Makes a POST request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of params which has to be sent in the body.
        Returns:
        JSONObject which is received by Smart API Trade.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • postRequestJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject postRequestJSON(java.lang.String url,
                                           org.json.JSONArray jsonArray,
                                           java.lang.String apiKey,
                                           java.lang.String accessToken)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           SmartAPIException,
                                           org.json.JSONException
        Make a JSON POST request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        jsonArray - is the JSON array of params which has to be sent in the body.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • putRequest

        public org.json.JSONObject putRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params,
                                      java.lang.String apiKey,
                                      java.lang.String accessToken)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      SmartAPIException,
                                      org.json.JSONException
        Makes a PUT request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of params which has to be sent in the body.
        Returns:
        JSONObject which is received by Smart API Trade.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • deleteRequest

        public org.json.JSONObject deleteRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params,
                                         java.lang.String apiKey,
                                         java.lang.String accessToken)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         SmartAPIException,
                                         org.json.JSONException
        Makes a DELETE request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of params which has to be sent in the query params.
        Returns:
        JSONObject which is received by Smart API Trade.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • getRequest

        public org.json.JSONObject getRequest(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String accessToken)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      SmartAPIException,
                                      org.json.JSONException
        Makes a GET request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be sent.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        commonKey - is the key that has to be sent in query param for quote calls.
        values - is the values that has to be sent in query param like 265, 256265, NSE:INFY.
        Returns:
        JSONObject which is received by Smart API Trade.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is a connection related error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API Trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown for parsing errors.

      • createGetRequest

        public okhttp3.Request createGetRequest(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                        java.lang.String url,
                                        java.lang.String accessToken)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a GET request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be done.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createGetRequest

        public okhttp3.Request createGetRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                        java.lang.String commonKey,
                                        java.lang.String[] values,
                                        java.lang.String apiKey,
                                        java.lang.String accessToken)
        Creates a GET request.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be done.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        commonKey - is the key that has to be sent in query param for quote calls.
        values - is the values that has to be sent in query param like 265, 256265, NSE:INFY.

        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of data that has to be sent in the body.

                                             org.json.JSONArray jsonArray,
                                             java.lang.String apiKey,
                                             java.lang.String accessToken)
        Create a POST request with body type JSON.
        Parameters:
        url - is the endpoint to which request has to be done.
        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        jsonArray - is the JSONArray of data that has to be sent in the body.

                                           java.lang.String accessToken)

        apiKey - is the api key of the Smart API Connect app.
        accessToken - is the access token obtained after successful login process.
        params - is the map of data that has to be sent in the query params.
